Summary: Series of three orange lights moving north/northeast steady speed.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Kingston
There were no other sightings in Kingston on or around August 6th 0001
divs: sighting detailsleaving a restaurant in andes, new york with family. looked up and saw a bright orange light, much brighter than a star or planet. moving north\northeast at a steady pace. two identical lights followed same path in n sequence. each light was not a point source. they looked wider at the bottom than at the top, almost like three points of light very close together in a pyramid formation. they did not blink like a plane and were only orange\yellow color. they were moving at a pace consistent with a conventional craft and kept a steady speed. as the first one seemed to go behind a cloud, a second identical object was seen coming along at the same rate from the same direction, in the same trajectory. what was unusual was the color and non-blinking nature of the lights, and the caravan like procession of the three. could have been military from stewart air base, 80 miles southeast, but it was something i had never seen before. at one point i may have heard jet engine sound, but this was hard to discern.
